This weekend, NYC faces dangerously low temperatures that could lead to frostbite within minutes, while the city grapples with early storm-related fatalities and rising pediatric flu deaths, alongside ongoing discussions about healthcare staffing shortages and public safety measures.

### Risks & Alerts

- NYC temperatures could cause frostbite in minutes this weekend. ### Civics & Politics
